snippet: Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. assigned two United States attorneys to lead separate criminal inquiries into disclosures of national security secrets to the news media.
abstract: Attorney Gen Eric H Holder Jr assigns two United States attorneys to lead separate criminal investigations into recent disclosures to the news media of national security secrets; appointment follows calls in Congress for a crackdown on leaks after disclosures on topics including drone strikes and a computer virus attack against Iran’s nuclear program.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. assigned two United States attorneys to lead separate criminal inquiries into disclosures of national security secrets to the news media.

headline.main: Holder Directs U.S. Attorneys to Track Down Paths of Leaks
headline.print_headline: 2 Inquiries Set To Track Down Paths of Leaks
